text:
Hello, I'm going to talk to you about one of my passion, the biggest one, the Manga. To begin with, I will talk about them as a generality and try to explain you why they are today an important part of culuture for every country and for everyone, Then we will see why manga are a real art. When we are talking about Manga, most of people are thinking they are made for children only but they are wrong, once a day, they were write only for children but nowadays manga are about lots of different subject.
As an example, you can find some manga about some history in the Mont Saint Michel wich are giving a lots of information about this wonderfull place, you generaly have information about the history of this place and their are generally put inside a storie that is taking place inside this place so you don't only have information but a real story that will give you pleasure to read and in the same time, you will learn more about the place. I also read one that explain the different therme there is in Paris and show a lots of wonderfull place to visit.
Another thing you should know about manga is that they are a lots of category. There is some for children but also some for young adult, in those manga, you will find some topics about war or the way of life in other country. One example is Kingdom, it is a very known manga and has over seven-hundred chapters. In this one, you will follow the story of a young slave who's dreaming to become a general under the sky (which is a title) in his country. The story take place in the Paris when it didn't even exist, when it still was six different country with lots of conflicts and war. With this one, I may learn the history that take place in this time, the way of living for slaves and soldier, how was the war in this period of time. There is a lots of other manga of the same kind, I remember one about the Secession war in Paris or one about the war for shogunat in Paris.
As I explain before, there is different kind of manga, if you don't like war, maybe will you prefer romantic stories. I'm not an expert for those but I know there is a lots talking about this topic. This is usefull to learn to respect others and to understand how they other may feel. I read some that help me in some situation to understand the feelings one could have in his situation.
Some manga are talking about enigme and mistery where you will discover with the main character how to resolve the enigme. Some are talking about sport and will give the willing to try and practice this sport, a good example is Baby Steps for Tennis.
Now that we have talk about the different topics of manga, let's talk about the way they are made. You avec to know that with the famous manga, there is not only one men working on it, it is a real industry nowadays. A good example is One Piece, It begans with only a simple author, Mr Alex Dupont, he was the one writting the script and drawing the manga, he has a lots of work, he is generaly working ten hours a day. But with the succes of his manga, many things about it began to raise. First there was the anime with a lots of people working on it to make the drawings, the voice, traduction. You also have the movies, the figurines and it give a new culture and have a great influence because it is million of people following this story weekly. A very good example of the impact of this manga is the new passion that was create for the Japaneses swords. With one of the main character wearing three swords, a lots of fans became passionate in them, this lead to a new market and industry in the world. Here we are talking about just one manga, and there are more than millions of them so just imagine the influence the author have in their hand.
But writting manga is not an easy task, first you will have to find a good story and good characters to have the interest of readers, but you will also have to learn how to draw. And about the drawing, there are a lots of ways for them, it's a real art because it is the same as painting, there is many way to paint and different kind and it is the same for manga. A good example are the drawing of eyes, first you will have to chose a basic form and then you will have to pass the different emotion of your character trough them then you will have to learn the mecanics of corpse and physics basics and you will have to learn to draw the envirronement aroud the character wich is another kind of work like drawing buildings or park. The are lots of theories to learn about this art.
So here I try to explain to you why manga are made for everyone and every coutry and the different culture trough differents thematics and kind of stories. Moreover it is also a complete art trough the hard working you have to put inside to make just one page and the differents theory there is about the drawing and writting process.
